EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal at Data Science Summit 2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Team -
On December 4th and 5th Pivotal will be a platinum sponsor at Data Beat's Data Science Summit. Data science is a core component of Pivotal products and solutions and will continue to be a central part of the conversations we are having with our customers. At this event, we will offer an unparalleled cross-section of experts and ideas from data science and analytics to the business of managing big data.
This two-day event will invite attendees to:
- Explore the challenges and opportunities of data science - Learn how data science is evolving - Be inspired by real use cases of innovative companies leveraging data science - Meet the new generation of data scientists
Attendees can register here <http://databeat2013.eventbrite.com/?discount=PivotalVIP> to take advantage of discounted pricing of 25%. Please invite your customers and prospects to the event. They could be decision-makers in technology or marketing, or represent a line of business — working at one of the thousands of companies needing help to make better decisions based on real data. Successful companies like Google, Amazon, LinkedIn, Facebook, and Netflix have used smart algorithms and data to disrupt their respective markets and create multi-billion dollar businesses.
Please share this exciting news and help make this a successful event!
- sa
